tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr.Harsha was very professional &systematic in diagnosis, treatment,communicating,etc,Regularly in touch with patient&their attendant.Very  smooth way of dressing,etc

Visited the Doctor and asked a few questions but the doctor did not like to be asked questions instead we only need to hear him. We can not clarify our doubts with the Doctor.

As a patient, we do pay for our consultation but the doctor will be in a hurry to close the conversation and send us out.
